follow these just 3 simple steps to request vacation:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Discuss vacation dates with the team and manager at XM (USA Mobile and USA Web teams request confirmation from stream leads);\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Request confirmation of the vacation in the email to the XM manager, putting in a CC Waldemar Zubik and Viacheslav Murygin, (in 99,9%) we are ok with your vacation if it is agreed with the client);\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Create a vacation request at \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://vacation.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://vacation.epam.com/\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and attach an email or screenshot with an approval (from point 2) to the attachment section.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-error\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please be aware that these 3 steps are mandatory steps to request
